interface.name: com.citrix.xenclient.xenmgr.powersettings
interface.tp:docstring: Let host object implement the power settings toggles.

method.name: get_ac_lid_close_action
method.tp:docstring: Returns the action to perform when the user closes the laptop lid when the device is attached to a power source.

method.name: get_battery_lid_close_action
method.tp:docstring: Returns the action to perform when the user closes the laptop lid when the device is running on battery power.

method.name: set_ac_lid_close_action
method.tp:docstring: Sets the action to perform when the user closes the laptop lid when the device is attached to a power source.

method.name: set_battery_lid_close_action
method.tp:docstring: Sets the action to perform when the user closes the laptop lid when the device is running on battery power.

signal.name: state_changed
signal.tp:docstring: Notify that the host state has changed (sleeping, hibernating etc).

signal.name: storage_space_low
signal.tp:docstring: Notify that the user is running out of storage space.

arg.name: percent_free
arg.tp:docstring: The percentage of free disk space remaining.

signal.name: license_changed
signal.tp:docstring: Notify that licensing evaluation has changed.

property.name: avail-mem
property.tp:docstring: Available memory, in megabytes. Can be bigger than free memory, since includes balloonable amount.

property.name: build-info
property.tp:docstring: Build number, date and associated information.

property.name: ui-ready
property.tp:docstring: UI please set this when you are ready. State will be stored in xenstore.

property.name: playback-pcm
property.tp:docstring: PCM device used for audio playback

property.name: capture-pcm
property.tp:docstring: PCM device used for audio capture

method.name: list_isos
method.tp:docstring: List the contents of the CD image (ISO) directory.

method.name: list_pci_devices
method.tp:docstring: List the PCI devices on the system. Returns a list of mappings, each including at least the device name, pciclass, vendor and ID.

method.name: list_gpu_devices
method.tp:docstring: Like above, with some logic to filter GPU devices.

method.name: list_disk_devices
method.tp:docstring: List the disk devices on system.

method.name: list_playback_devices
method.tp:docstring: List audio playback devices on system

method.name: list_capture_devices
method.tp:docstring: List audio capture devices on system

method.name: list_sound_cards
method.tp:docstring: List sound cards on system

method.name: list_sound_card_controls
method.tp:docstring: List controlable parameters of a sound card

method.name: get_sound_card_control
method.tp:docstring: Set sound card control parameter value

method.name: set_sound_card_control
method.tp:docstring: Set sound card control parameter value

method.name: list_cd_devices
method.tp:docstring: List cdrom devices on system

method.name: assign_cd_device
method.tp:docstring: Assign CD device to given VM (or remove assignment if vm param empty)

method.name: get_cd_device_assignment
method.tp:docstring: Get CD device's assigned VM

method.name: eject_cd_device
method.tp:docstring: Physically eject media tray

method.name: list_ui_plugins
method.tp:docstring: List UI plugins on system.

method.name: is_service_running
method.tp:docstring: Tests if a named dbus service is currently running.

arg.name: service
arg.tp:docstring: The name of the service to check for.

arg.name: running
arg.tp:docstring: Boolean value indicating whether the service is running.

method.name: configure_gpu_placement
method.tp:docstring: Configures GPU placement for purposes of tracking VM switching when moving the mouse over the monitor edge. 0 = not set.

arg.name: slot
arg.tp:docstring: Slot number, from left to right, in ascending order.

method.name: get_gpu_placement
method.tp:docstring: Get the GPU placement slot.

arg.name: slot
arg.tp:docstring: GPU placement slot or 0 if not set.

method.name: get_seconds_from_epoch
method.tp:docstring: Get number of seconds from epoch.

method.name: shutdown
method.tp:docstring: Shutdown the host device.

method.name: reboot
method.tp:docstring: Reboot the host device.

method.name: sleep
method.tp:docstring: Send the host into s3 (sleep).

method.name: hibernate
method.tp:docstring: Send the host into s4 (hibernate).

arg.name: expiry_date
arg.tp:docstring: Expiry date in the format yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM.

interface.name: com.citrix.xenclient.xenmgr.installer
interface.tp:docstring: Helpers methods for the OEM installer.

method.name: get_eula
method.tp:docstring: Contents of the EULA, or empty string.

method.name: get_installstate
method.tp:docstring: Get progress of the installation bits.

method.name: progress_installstate
method.tp:docstring: Set progress of the installation bits.
